Presenting Problem / Chief Complaint: "Patient expresses a desire to pursue a career in music, facing family pressure to choose a more conventional job."
History of Present Illness (HPI): "Patient has experienced family disagreements regarding future plans, feeling frustrated by the conflict between family expectations and personal dreams."
Risk Assessment: "Patient feels nervous about reaching out to a potential mentor, concerned about rejection but recognizes it as a learning opportunity."
Current Functional Status: "Patient has been using coping strategies for PTSD, showing increased awareness of triggers and feeling empowered by progress in managing emotions."
Progress Evaluation: "Patient reports significant improvement in managing reactions and feelings, feeling more in control of emotions."
Therapeutic Interventions: "Patient engaged in breathing exercises as a grounding technique to manage anxiety."
Next Steps: "Patient plans to research the music industry and develop an action plan for pursuing a record label, while continuing to work on anxiety management strategies."
